name: mHealth
description: mHealth help corporate personalize their wellness calendar, create focused groups, engage employees through stepathon challenges, teleconsultation, diet & nutrition consultation, mindfulness sessions, and other wellness programs. Our performance dashboards help HR Leaders improve the efficacy and engagement in the program. Our open architecture approach helps us seamlessly integrate with partner networks and provide a B2B Wellness marketplace to customers.
Headline: We help build healthy habit using power of community & rewards
ShortDescription: mHealth help corporate personalize their wellness calendar, create focused groups, engage employees through stepathon challenges, teleconsultation, diet & nutrition consultation, mindfulness sessions, and other wellness programs.

Highlights.name: Journal Focus
Highlights.description: mHealth is a medical journal that publishes articles on mobile health interventions for chronic diseases.

Highlights.name: Journal Achievements
Highlights.description: In 2023, the journal received a CiteScore of 5.4. It is also a member of the Committee on Publication Ethics (COPE).

enhanced_description: mHealth is a corporate wellness platform designed to personalize wellness initiatives, foster community, and improve employee engagement across all company sizes, from small to global enterprises. It enables organizations to create customized wellness calendars, form focused groups, and engage employees through diverse programs such as stepathon challenges, teleconsultation, diet & nutrition consultation, and mindfulness sessions. The platform provides performance dashboards and analytics, empowering HR leaders to monitor and enhance the efficacy and engagement of wellness programs. With an open architecture, mHealth seamlessly integrates with partner networks, offering a comprehensive B2B Wellness marketplace to customers. The solution aims to build healthy habits through community and rewards, directly contributing to improved employee happiness and overall well-being.
key_use_cases: Creating and managing focused employee wellness groups
Engaging employees through stepathon challenges and other wellness activities
Monitoring and improving program efficacy and employee engagement for HR Leaders
Accessing a B2B Wellness marketplace through integrated partner networks
competitive_advantages: Open architecture approach for seamless integration with partner networks
Proprietary B2B Wellness marketplace for customers
Performance dashboards specifically designed for HR Leaders to track efficacy and engagement
Customized program creation and corporate microsite for tailored wellness experiences
hr_functions_supported: Total Rewards (specifically employee benefits and wellness programs)
Learning and Development (through consultations and mindfulness sessions)
HR Analytics (performance dashboards for program efficacy and engagement)
integration_capabilities: Provides access to a B2B Wellness marketplace
